textBox.richText: I started a new job this week in Dresden, Germany. At the Max Planck Institute - CBG to be exact. Suzie dropped in from France last weekend to help me settle in, and we had a look around town, aided by an underpowered and comical looking hired fiat panda. Despite having visited twice before, I was very pleasantly surprised to find the old town area Aldstadt full of fantastic old architecture. Much rebuilt after the war and it’s firebombing campaign, in particular the church which cost 130 million to fix up back to the original state. All very nice. Then there’s the Neustadt, where all the punks and hippies, students and other odd folk live. Think I’ll get a flat there, amidst the bars, restaurants and clubs. Quite the “happening” place apparently, lots of music and other arts.
